item.title: Japan raises nuclear power goal in post-Fukushima shift
item.description: A new energy plan cites growing demand from power-hungry AI data centres and semiconductor plants.

item.title: Germany's tensions over immigration laid bare ahead of election
item.description: In the western city of Oberhausen the BBC finds conflicting attitudes towards immigration ahead of the vote.

item.title: All passengers survive crash landing as plane flips at Toronto airport
item.description: Eighteen of the 80 people on board were injured after the Delta plane overturned on landing.

item.title: 'Everyone must go': New Zealand's tourism drive draws ire
item.description: What was meant as a catchy tagline has been dubbed tone-deaf amid high emigration and unemployment.

item.title: 'Died for stealing chocolate': Pakistan anger over death of child maid
item.description: Pakistani police have filed murder charges against a couple who employed the 13-year-old girl.
